name: btrax, Inc.
tag_list: web-design, branding, multilingual, chinese, japanese, u-s-, social, media, pr, promotion
overview:
btrax is a cross‚Äêcultural consulting, branding and marketing agency focused on the US and Asian markets with clients ranging from startups to Fortune 100 companies.

Our fully bilingual and bicultural team provides results-driven strategies and creative solutions through offices in San Francisco, Tokyo, Los Angeles,Shanghai and New York City.

We serve the global market and our specialty is the Asian market, specifically Japan/China, with services for design, web, mobile, and social media.

  • Innovative strategies to identify new revenue streams, competitor differentiation points, and the most cost-effective web technologies
  • Unified branding for web and print materials that fully engage your target audience and niche users
  • Expert localization performed by our in-house staff, which includes native speakers of Japanese, English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Korean and Spanish
  • Back-end development to keep your site content fresh and track user behavior through easy-to-use admin tools
  • Dynamic marketing to build name recognition, brand value and search engine visibility through print, event, web, and social media channels

We have deep experience working with large global companies and ad agencies, as well as start-ups and emerging brands. This isn’t just a job for us. We really enjoy what we do and who we work with.

Intrigued? Give us a ring at 415-344-0907
